cards.name: Adhesive Bandage
cards.description:
Unplayable.
If this card is discarded from your hand, retrieve it and gain 4 (6) Block.

cards.name: Fourth Eye
cards.description:
Gain 6 (9) Block.
Track 3 (4).

cards.name: Jump
cards.description:
Discard 1 card.
Retrieve it. (Discard it.)

cards.name: Playing Safe
cards.description:
Discard your hand.
Retrieve that many other random cards.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Scavenge
cards.description:
Draw 2 (3) cards.
if you have an Unplayable card in your hand, exhaust 1 card.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Sleight of Hand
cards.description: When you play this card, discard it.

cards.name: Swiftness
cards.description:
Unplayable.
If this card is discarded from your hand, retrieve it and add 2  (upgraded ) Shivs to your hand.

cards.name: Trace
cards.description:
Deal 6 (9) damage.
If you have discarded a card this turn, Track 3 (4) and draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Venomologist
cards.description:
Unplayable.
If this card is discarded from your hand, retrieve it and apply 4 (5) Poison to a random enemy.

cards.name: Acid Rain
cards.description: Deal 4 (5) damage and apply 4 (5) Poison to a random enemy for each Unplayable card in your hand.

cards.name: Balance
cards.description:
Draw 2 cards.
Discard them.
Retrieve them.
~~- Exhaust. -~~

cards.name: Blink
cards.description:
Gain 12 (16) Block.
Discard 1 card at random.

cards.name: Clarity
cards.description:
Gain 6 (10) Block.
If you have discarded a card this turn, retrieve 2 cards.

cards.name: Evade
cards.description:
Gain 3 Block for each card in your hand.
Discard your hand.

cards.name: Juggle
cards.description:
Draw 2 cards.
If you have discarded a card this turn, Track 5 (8).

cards.name: Mind Games
cards.description:
(Innate.)
Whenever you draw an Unplayable (#yUnplayable) card, give it Retain this combat.

cards.name: Recall
cards.description: At the end of your turn, draw 1 (2) card (cards).

cards.name: Roll
cards.description: At the start of your turn, discard 1 random card.

cards.name: Shuffle
cards.description:
Unplayable.
If this card is discarded from your hand, retrieve another (the) random (bottom) card from (of) your discard pile.

cards.name: Sprint
cards.description:
Draw a card for each Unplayable card in your hand.
~~- Exhaust. -~~

cards.name: Stopwatch
cards.description: Gain 2 (3) Block and 2 (3) additional block for each card you discarded this turn.

cards.name: Toxin
cards.description:
Draw 3 (4) cards.
Gain [G] for each Unplayable card drawn.

cards.name: Train
cards.description:
(Innate.)
At the start of your turn, add 1 random Unplayable card to your hand.

cards.name: Blade Shield
cards.description: Gain 3 (4) Block for each Shiv you discarded this combat.

cards.name: Contemplate
cards.description:
Track 4 (6).
Selected cards cost 0 this turn.

cards.name: Discard King
cards.description: Discard 1 card and retrieve it X (+1) times.

cards.name: Entomb
cards.description:
Choose a card.
Exhaust it to add a Shadow of it to your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Fireworks
cards.description:
Can only be played if you have 5 or more Unplayable cards in your hand.
Deal 25 (35) damage to all enemies 6 times.
Take an extra turn.

cards.name: Flash
cards.description: Discard your discard pile.

cards.name: Phantom
cards.description:
Unplayable.
When you draw this, trigger discard effects on all of your cards~~- , -~~   (and ) lose [G]~~-  , and exhaust this card -~~ .

cards.name: Poison Needle
cards.description:
Deal 4 (6) damage.
Apply 2 Poison.
Whenever you discard a card from your hand, retrieve this.

cards.name: Revise
cards.description:
Track 4 (10) .
Exhaust selected cards.
Exhaust.

cards.name: The Wheel
cards.description:
Draw 5 cards.
Discard 5 cards.

cards.name: Twilight
cards.description: The next time you retrieve 9 (6) cards, take an extra turn.

keywords.name: Retrieve
keywords.description: Put a card from your discard pile back into your hand.

keywords.name: Track
keywords.description: Look at the top X cards of your discard pile. You may put any number of them to the bottom of your draw pile.
